code="a">With Rare Books copy 1 is bound: Laws relating to the Camden and Philadelphia Steamboat Ferry Company. Camden, N.J. : Curtis, printer, 1846 -- Third address to the people of Maryland / William H. Collins. Baltimore : Printed by James Young, 1861 -- Rules for the government of the grammar, secondary, and primary schools in the first section of the First School District of Pennsylvania / First School District of Pennsylvania (Philadelphia, Pa.). First Section. Directors of the Public Schools. Philadelphia : Crissy & Markley, 1848 -- The privilege of the writ of habeas corpus under the Constitution. Second part / Horace Binney. Philadelphia : C. Sherman & Son, 1862 -- A letter to a friend in a slave state / Charles Ingersoll. Philadelphia : [s.n.], 1862 -- Personal liberty and martial law / Edward Ingersoll. Philadelphia : [s.n.], 1862 -- A review of Mr. Seward's diplomac / William B. Reed. [Philadelphia? : s.n., 1862] -- A new "Sartor resartus" / Dr. Syntax. [S.l. : s.n.], 1862 -- Correspondence relating to the recruiting of troops for the Department of New England / Massachusetts. Governor (1861-1866 : Andrew). [Boston : s.n., 1862] -- The conduct of the war / William E. Lehman. [Washington, D.C.? : Towers & Co., 1862] -- Letter of Hon. Montgomery Blair, postmaster general / Montgomery Blair. Washington : Printed at the Congressional Globe Office, 1862 -- Report of the managers of the Magdalen Society for ... / Magdalen Society (Philadelphia, Pa.) [Philadelphia, Pa. : The Society], 1861 (vol. for 1860) -- A review of the Report upon the physics and hydraulics of the Mississippi River / Edwin Hale Abbot. Boston : Crosby and Nichols, 1862 -- Report of the Topographical Bureau / United States.</subfield><subfield code="b">Army. Corps of Engineers. Washington, D.C. : Bureau of Topographical Engineers, 1861 -- Annual report of the Inspectors of the Philadelphia County Prison, made to the Legislature / Philadelphia County (Pa.) Prison. Board of Inspectors. Harrisburg, Pa. : J.M.G. Lescure, printer to the State, 1862 (15th) -- Report of the Committee of the Board of Inspectors of the State Penitentiary of the Eastern District of Pennsylvania on the act of Assembly, approved May 1, 1861, entitled An act relative to prison discipline, November, 1861 / State Penitentiary for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania. Philadelphia : M'Laughlin Brothers, 1861 -- Report of the Western Penitentiary for the year ... / State Penitentiary for the Western District of Pennsylvania. Pittsburgh, Pa. : Johnston and Stockton, 1862 (vol. for 1861) -- Annual report of the Inspectors of the Philadelphia County Prison, made to the Legislature / Philadelphia County (Pa.) Prison. Board of Inspectors. Harrisburg, Pa. : J.M.G. Lescure, printer to the State, 1861 (14th) -- Copies of letters and extracts from officers of prison in several states in relation to shortening sentences for good conduct. [Philadelphia? : s.n., 1862?] -- Ex re. W. Johnson vs. J.S. Halloway, warden, &c / Furman Sheppard. [Pennsylvania? : s.n., 1861?] -- Commonwealth of Pennsylvania ex relatione William Johnson, vs. John S. Holloway [i.e. Halloway], warden of the Eastern State Penitentiary / William Johnson. [Pennsylvania? : s.n., 1861?] -- Objects of the Institute for Colored Youth / Institute for Colored Youth (Philadelphia, Pa.). Philadelphia : C. Sherman & Son, 1861 -- The ... annual report of the mission in the County Insane Hospital, and other departments of Blockley / Jones, Edward C. Philadelphia : King & Baird, printers, 1860 (12th) -- Report of the Pennsylvania Hospital for the Insane / Pennsylvania Hospital for the Insane. Philadelphia : [s.n.], 1861 (vol. for 1860) -- Annual report of the managers of the Pennsylvania Institution for the Instruction of the Blind / Pennsylvania Institution for the Instruction of the Blind. Harrisburg : State printer, 1861 (28th)-- Annual report of the managers of the Pennsylvania Institution for the Instruction of the Blind / Pennsylvania Institution for the Instruction of the Blind. Harrisburg : State printer, 1860 (27th) -- Annual report of the Trustees of the Society for the Advancement of Christianity in Pennsylvania / Society of the Protestant Episcopal Church for the Advancement of Christianity in Pennsylvania. Philadelphia : King & Baird, Printers, 1860 (48th) -- Common school laws of Pennsylvania / Pennsylvania. Harrisburg, [s.n.], 1857  -- By-laws of the Board of Directors of the Public Schools for the First Section of the First School District of Pennsylvania / First School District of Pennsylvania (Philadelphia, Pa.). First Section. Directors of the Public Schools.
